tests.name: Check query file runs
tests.run: docker exec sql2017 /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P Pa\$\$w0rd1234 -d master -i /app/create-database.sql

tests.name: Check database exists
tests.run: docker exec sql2017 /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P Pa\$\$w0rd1234 -Q "SELECT NAME FROM sys.sysdatabases"

tests.name: Check customer table exists
tests.run: docker exec sql2017 /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P Pa\$\$w0rd1234 -Q "SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM SimpleDB.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'"
